message.entry: Sparse arrays are not supported.
Sample points must have the same number of elements as the operating dimension of the first input argument.
The number of rows in the sample points matrix must match the number of elements in the first input argument.
The total number of sample points must match the number of elements in the first input argument.
Sample and query points must be full vectors of real, finite values.
Sample and query point grid vectors must be full vectors of real, finite values.
Sample and query points specified as a matrix must be full and contain real, finite values.
Sample and query points must be double or single.
Sample and query point vectors must be double or single.
Invalid cotangent transformation information.
Scaling offset for cotangent transformation must be a scalar.
Invalid scaling parameters for cotangent transformation.
Nodes must have the same floating point type as the input array.
Nodes must be a vector.
Scaling factors must have the same floating point type as the input array.
Scaling factors must be full.
Scaling factors must be a vector.
Scaling factors must be complex.
Input scaling factors must have the same number of elements as the number of sample points.
Output scaling factors must have the same number of elements as the number of query points.
Number of grid vectors must be equal to the number of dimensions.
Node matrix must have as many columns as there are dimensions in the transform.
Number of dimensions must be a positive scalar.
Invalid uniform grid specification.
Input array has an incorrect number of elements.
Either the query or sample points must be empty.
Uniform output grid must be smaller than the oversampled grid.
